00012 class DigitalModule;
00013 
00030 class PWM : public SensorBase
00031 {
00032     friend class DigitalModule;
00033 public:
00034     typedef enum {kPeriodMultiplier_1X = 1, kPeriodMultiplier_2X = 2, kPeriodMultiplier_4X = 4} PeriodMultiplier;
00035 
00036     explicit PWM(UINT32 channel);
00037     PWM(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel);
00038     virtual ~PWM();
00039     virtual void SetRaw(UINT8 value);
00040     virtual UINT8 GetRaw();
00041     void SetPeriodMultiplier(PeriodMultiplier mult);
00042     void EnableDeadbandElimination(bool eliminateDeadband);
00043     void SetBounds(INT32 max, INT32 deadbandMax, INT32 center, INT32 deadbandMin, INT32 min);
00044 
00045 protected:
00064     static const UINT32 kDefaultPwmPeriod = 774;
00065 
00073     static const UINT32 kDefaultMinPwmHigh = 102;
00074 
00075     static const INT32 kPwmDisabled = 0;
00076 
00077     virtual void SetPosition(float pos);
00078     virtual float GetPosition();
00079     virtual void SetSpeed(float speed);
00080     virtual float GetSpeed();
00081 
00082     bool m_eliminateDeadband;
00083     INT32 m_maxPwm;
00084     INT32 m_deadbandMaxPwm;
00085     INT32 m_centerPwm;
00086     INT32 m_deadbandMinPwm;
00087     INT32 m_minPwm;
00088 
00089 private:
00090     void InitPWM(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel);
00091     UINT32 m_channel;
00092     DigitalModule *m_module;
00093     INT32 GetMaxPositivePwm() { return m_maxPwm; };
00094     INT32 GetMinPositivePwm() { return m_eliminateDeadband ? m_deadbandMaxPwm : m_centerPwm + 1; };
00095     INT32 GetCenterPwm() { return m_centerPwm; };
00096     INT32 GetMaxNegativePwm() { return m_eliminateDeadband ? m_deadbandMinPwm : m_centerPwm - 1; };
00097     INT32 GetMinNegativePwm() { return m_minPwm; };
00098     INT32 GetPositiveScaleFactor() {return GetMaxPositivePwm() - GetMinPositivePwm();} 
00099     INT32 GetNegativeScaleFactor() {return GetMaxNegativePwm() - GetMinNegativePwm();} 
00100     INT32 GetFullRangeScaleFactor() {return GetMaxPositivePwm() - GetMinNegativePwm();} 
00101 };
